snippet.title: Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza - 27 Just Like Saigon - Uncommented UHD 4K
snippet.description:
No commentary playthrough of Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza. In Normal difficulty level and proper FoV.

Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza is a first person shooter created by Piranha Games which finally runs on the Lithtech engine, after undergoing development hell through the Build and GoldSrc engine. It tries to faithfuly recreate the events of the original movie, and it success in that matter to a reasonable extent. However, the game is very weak, with bad graphics, so-so gameplay, and atrocious voice acting.
-----------------------
Playthrough sin comentar de Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza. Nivel de dificultad Normal y con el FoV ajustado.

Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza es un shooter creado por Piranha Games que corre en el motor Lithtech, después de pasar por un infernal desarollo habiendo pisado los motores Build y GoldSrc. Intenta representar los eventos de la película original, y en ese aspecto alcanza cierto éxito. No obstante, el juego es muy flojo, con gráficos malos, gameplay regulero, y unas voces realmente espantosas.

#diehard #pcgaming #retrogaming
Wishlist: https://www.amazon.es/hz/wishlist/ls/2NPGHVYTC585R?ref_=wl_share
